original_text:
Mightier than the thunder of the great waters,
    mightier than the breakers of the sea—
    the Lord on high is mighty.
korean_text: 높이 계신 여호와의 능력은 많은 물 소리와 바다의 큰 파도보다 크니이다

sentences.original_text: Mightier than the thunder of the great waters
mightier than the breakers of the sea
the Lord on high is mighty
